effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder's Rain Dance will create rain lasting for eight turns rather than five.  As this item affects the move rather than the weather itself, the effect is not lost if the holder leaves battle or drops this item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Rain Dance by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせた　ポケモンが　あまごいを
使うと　いつもより　あめの
時間が　長くなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of the move
Rain Dance when used by the holder.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Allunga la durata della mossa Pioggiadanza.

Tabla de piedra que potencia los movimientos de
tipo Hielo. Debe llevarla un Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Verlängert die Dauer
von Regentanz, wenn der Träger es einsetzt.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la durée de la capacité
Danse Pluie utilisée par le porteur.

지니게 한 포켓몬이 비바라기를
쓰면 여느 때보다 비 내리는
시간이 길어진다.

もたせた　ポケモンが　あまごいを
つかうと　いつもより　あめの
じかんが　ながくなる。

A Pokémon held item that extends the
duration of the move Rain Dance used
by the holder.

duration of the move Rain Dance used
